stressedArray: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
You should take the approach that you’re wrong. Your goal is to be less wrong.
Elon Musk
You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
A.A. Milne
The greatest thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
Oliver Wendell Holmes
“I can’t do it” never yet accomplished anything; “I will try” has performed wonders.
”  George P. Burnham
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Winston Churchill
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Albert Einstein
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Wayne Gretzky
When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one that has opened for us.
Alexander Graham Bell
Positive things happen to positive people.
Sarah Beeny
anxiousArray: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Walt Disney
My proceeds from the PayPal acquisition were $180 million, I put $100 million in SpaceX, $70m in Tesla, and $10m in Solar City. I had to borrow money for rent.
Elon Musk
I'm not trying to be anyone's savior. I'm just trying to think about the future and not be sad.
Elon Musk
You don’t have to be great to start, but you so have to start to be great.
Zig Ziglar
An obstacle may be either a stepping stone or a stumbling block.
Anonymous
Start by doing what’s necessary, then what’s possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
Francis of Assisi
Every single journey that I’ve embarked on, I’ve learned something new.
Shailene Woodley
One person with courage makes a majority.
Andrew Jackson
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Eleanor Roosevelt
panickyArray: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Franklin D. Roosvelt
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favour.
Elon Musk
You get paid in direct proportion to the difficulty of problems you solve.
Elon Musk
It is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.
Elon Musk
Every experience in your life is being orchestrated to teach you something you need to know to move forward.
Brian Tracy
We must be willing to fail and to appreciate the truth that often “Life is not a problem to be solved, but a mystery to be lived.
M. Scott Peck
There are so many things you can learn about.
But you’ll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.
Dr. Seuss
Before you build a better mousetrap, it helps to know if there are any mice out there.
Yogi Berra
The world is round, and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
Ivy Baker Priest
Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
Les Brown
excitedArray: Good, better, best. Never let it rest.'Til your good is better and your better is best.
I think it would be great to be born on Earth and die on Mars. Just hopefully not at the point of impact.
Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for doing it.
The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
The value of intellectuals is neither their intellect nor the value of their intellect but the value of what they use their intellect to do.
If you will pump long enough, hard enough, and enthusiastically enough, sooner or later the effort will bring forth the reward.
Chase career relationships, not job postings.
To be a great champion, you must believe you are the best. If you’re not, pretend you are.
Take risks: if you win, you will be happy; if you lose, you will be wise.
happyArray: If opportunity doesn’t knock, then build a door.
Milton Berle
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Jim Ryun
Opportunities don’t often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.
Audrey Hepburn
Bad boss? Fire him/her. When you’re interviewing for a job, You’re job is to interview them. You are an equal.
Richie Norton
All of the darkness of the world cannot put out the light of one small candle.
Anonymous
Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
Hamilton Holt
Never tell me the sky’s the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
Anonymous
Earn your confidence, nurture it, then help to build it in others.
Alex Malley
Success doesn’t come to you, you go to it.
Marva Collins
Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
John F Kennedy
